description: Non-material minor amendment to condition 2 (Drawing Numbers) of application reference P2013/3657/FUL dated 20/12/2013 for the change of use of Unit 1 from B1/B8 (office/warehouse) use to B1/B8/D2 (office/warehouse/gym) use, and associated works. The amendment seeks to replace the ground and mezzanine floor-plans as previously approved in order to vary the internal layout as approved, and the indicative location of external plant.
decision_conditions:
Condition 2 of planning permission ref: P2013/3657/FUL should read:

CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Site Plan, 2-200 Rev C, 2-201 Rev B, Travel Plan dated May 2013, Energy and Sustainability Report, Planning Statement dated October 2013, Marketing Report dated May 2013.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
